content: what you need for this crochet pattern yarn - pound of love from lionbrand yarn 1 skein = 454g/16oz 932m/1020yd 4 medium/worsted hooks - 10mm / n/p-15 & 6mm / j-10 wooden dowel - 12 long scissors yarn needle stitch markers the sizing guide follows size xs + s m+l xl+2xl 3xl+4xl 5xl e g 90 110 132 152 174 means 90 for xs and s 110 for m and l 132 for xl and 2xl 152 for 3xl and 4xl 174 for 5xl final measurements for this cardigan for all sizes in inches bust only the main panel without ribbing 34 42 50 58 66 length 32 for all sizes without the bottom ribbing it s adjustable for your own needs arm depth explained in the pattern for your size
